statements: UPDATE game_progress SET player_name = 'Alice', total_playtime = '10:30:00' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_progress SET achievements_completed = 5, player_name = 'Bob' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE game_progress SET achievements_completed = 10, total_playtime = '5 hours' WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE game_progress SET player_name = 'John Doe', total_playtime = '10 hours' WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_name = 'New Achievement Name', achievement_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE achievement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_progress SET total_progress = 100, level = 2 WHERE player_id = '98765432-ABCD-4321-ABCDE-098765432100';
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_description = 'New description', achievement_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE achievement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_progress SET total_progress = total_progress + 10, level = level + 1 WHERE player_id = '98765432-1234-5678-abcdef012345';
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_name = 'Updated Achievement 1' WHERE achievement_id = 1;
UPDATE player_recognition SET recognition_type = 'Employee of the Month' WHERE player_id = 5;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_name = 'New Achievement Name', achievement_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE achievement_id = 1;
UPDATE player_progress SET level = 10, experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE achievements SET date_achieved = '2021-10-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_progress SET experience = 5000, level = 10 WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_name = 'Updated Achievement 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_info SET registration_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE player_id = 100;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_name='Updated Achievement 1' WHERE achievement_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE leaderboard SET player_score=5000 WHERE player_id='87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_name = 'New Name', achievement_description = 'New Description' WHERE achievement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE leaderboard SET player_score = 1000 WHERE player_id = 'abcdefgh-ijkl-mnop-qrst-uvwxyz123456';
